messages.title: WE CAN'T GO ON LIKE THIS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce the deficit and rebuild trust in the political system.
Protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
Stand up for families, sort out our schools.

issues.economy: Reduce the deficit and rebuild trust in our political system. Can’t go on like this.
issues.education: Sort out our schools and stand up for families.
issues.governance: Rebuild trust in our political system. Can’t go on like this.
issues.health: Protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble, we need to mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system. We can’t go on like this. Britain needs change to get the country back on its feet - to heal the mistakes of the past and bring new ideas and fresh vigour for our future.
